Package com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.did

Class HcsDidRootKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.did.HcsDidRootKey
  • public class HcsDidRootKey
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a root key of HCS Identity DID. That is a public key of type Ed25519VerificationKey2018 compatible with a single publicKey entry of a DID Document.
